title: Livelock – v25031
body:

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Livelock-CODEX ISO release: codex-livelock.iso (9,056,124,928 bytes)
  • Missing voicepacks added: Russian (427 MB), German (437 MB) & French (440 MB), courtesy of UberPsyX
  • Patch v25031 installed over, courtesy of UberPsyX
  • Alternative crack (Steamworks Fix, courtesy of UberPsyX), allowing multiplayer via Steam, available in NoDVD folder after installation
  • Selective download feature: additional voicepacks and bonus game soundtrack made optional downloads
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 9.7 to 4.4~4.7 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes 10-20 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 10 GB (~11 GB during installation)

Game Description

Livelock is a co-operative top-down shooter where you play solo or with up to two allies to break the cycle of infinite war between machines. As one of the remaining Capital Intellects, your role is to unlock Eden and revive humanity.

Take control of one of three mechanical chassis – Hex, Vanguard or Catalyst – to defeat intelligent mechanical enemies.
